New Cultivars
See All
#FCE0B9

You will definitely want to catch this bouquet of flowers! The growth structure and frostiness of the Barb married to the dank chunky nugs of the Wedding Cake is a match made in the garden. With floral notes on the inhale and kush on the exhale, this is a very potent heavy hitter.

Here comes the Barb
A very potent heavy hitter!
+
#93CA44

Rainbow Barb is a Z3 Zkittlez leaning cultivar with copious amounts of resin and a complex terp profile blending Barb’s floral notes with an explosion of candy flavours on the exhale. Barb lends her strong vegetative growth and flower structure to make this Z3 Zkittlez cross ideal in every way. 

 

Rainbow Barb
Complex terpene profile
+
#FF9AA2

This flower delivers a strong, sour grapefruit smell and taste from start to finish. Both the Barb and the Grapefruit have great structure and short flowering times and when paired together produce unbelievable amounts of trichomes.

Grapefruit Barb
A strong sour grapefruit smell and taste
+
#9966CC

We took the incredible smell and the structure of Soma’s Lavender OG and hit it with the extra trichome producing and quick flowering Barb to produce a truly remarkable cultivar. The frostiness of this plant will astound you, with strong OG notes on the inhale yet distinctly floral lavender notes on the exhale.

Lavender Barb
Barbara Bud (s) x Lavender OG (f)
+
#878610

The Sticky Barb provides an earthy, coffee-like flavour with hints of caramel on the exhale, reminiscent of the Afghani found in the heritage of both parents. The effect is mostly felt in the body, with strong pain-killing and muscle relaxing properties.

Sticky Barb
Coffee-like flavor with hints of caramel
+
#FFD632

This sativa-dominant hybrid has the classic ISS bud shape and big yields with better plant structure and an earlier finish from the Barb. The flower has that classic sweet skunk aroma with hints of peach and citrus. Surprisingly, the taste provides pure skunk notes.

Island Sweet Barb
Barbara Bud (s) X Island Sweet Skunk (f)
+
Best Sellers
See All
#D93A00

After winning 20+ International awards, it is fair to say that Barbara Bud is a superstar, known best for the quantity and quality of resin she produces and also for her social and creative high.

Barbara Bud
20+ International awards
+
#DC7A0B

We knew combining Barbara Bud with the Tangie would create a fantastic plant with a striking fragrance and flavour profile and the Orange Barb strain nails it. 

 

Like Barbara Bud, Orange Barb has a fantastic growth structure. This plant grows tall and produces a higher than average yield. 

Orange Barb
Aroma of freshly peeled blood oranges
+
#636479

This 20:1 high CBD low THC Cannatonic IBL strain is high on healing properties and low on psychoactive effects. Known to reduce physical and mental aches and pains, the Highlo certainly induces a calm and relaxed state of mind. She has beautiful light green flowers and a fruity aroma with distinctive cherry undertones. 

Highlo
20:1 high CBD low THC Cannatonic IBL
+
#7F803A

Jean Guy is a famous sativa strain from the Montreal Compassion Club and was the first ever cannabis strain to be featured in the New York times.  

 

Jean Guy
Montreal Compassion Club’s famous sativa
+

Great Gardener on 

 

The Great Gardener Second trip part II

Second part of my second trip over to visit with The house of the Great Gardener. more hash making, more hash smoking, and of course more cannabis growing.

House of the Great Gardener " The growing continues"

Super happy to be heading back to visit Mat at the House of the Great Gardener.

•

 

The House of the Great Gardener has been honing its selection of cultivars for over 20 years including more than a decade of work with medical clubs in Canada. Our practice is based on the understanding of the deep connection between plants and humans.
